title: Bapteme
description: In 1935, near Bethune (northern France), Aline marries Pierre instead of the man who had been chosen for her. After their honeymoon, Aline replaces her mother running a small cafe while Pierre works on fairs and markets. Largely inspired by the real story of his parents, Rene Feret's film chronicles the ups and downs of a working class couple from the 1930's to the 1960's.  Credits: Producers,  Eric Trotta, Louis Wipf ; director, Rene Feret ; writer, Rene Feret ; photography, Pierre Lhomme ; music,  Frederic Chopin, Evelyne Stroh. Cast: Valerie Stroh, Jean-Yves Berteloot, Jacques Bonnaffe, Pierre-Alain Chapuis, Edith Scob, Elsa Zylberstein.
